name: Build the Oasis: City
description:
Find the monkeys hidden around the city!

This is a proof of concept for "just-in-time geometry."  The application is a 3D game client that downloads the visible part of the world just-in-time (rather than a bulk download or loading from disk).  For more details, please visit https://www.buildtheoasis.com.

Your device must support OpenGL 2.1 / OpenGL ES 2.0.
